# CartDelivery - Storefront API

Choose a version:unstable 2026-04 release candidate2026-01 latest2025-10 2025-07 2025-04 2026-01latest[Anchor to CartDelivery](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDelivery#top)# CartDeliveryobjectAsk assistantThe delivery properties of the cart.

## [Anchor to Fields](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDelivery#fields)Fields- addresses ([CartSelectableAddress!]!)[Anchor to addresses](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartDelivery#field-CartDelivery.fields.addresses)addresses•[[CartSelectableAddress!]!](/docs/api/storefront/latest/objects/CartSelectableAddress)non-nullSelectable addresses to present to the buyer on the cart.
